desc: Ever Be Signs exists to encourage people, made in God’s image to seek first the Kingdom of God through a daily remembrance of His Word through faith-based goods. Browse our shop for home goods & gifts: curated handmade gift boxes, laser-engraved wood signs, bookmarks, scripture resources & leather cuff bracelets.

layout.text: Since I was a little girl, I have known the power found in words, both spoken or written...
